description.value: HL7-defined code system of concepts specifying the priority for the shipment. Used in HL7 Version 2.x messaging in the SHP segment.

purpose.value: Underlying Master Code System for V2 table 0906 (ActPriority)

copyright.value: This material derives from the HL7 Terminology (THO). THO is copyright Â©1989+ Health Level Seven International and is made available under the CC0 designation. For more licensing information see: https://terminology.hl7.org/license.html

description.value: Version of HL7 in which the code was deprecated

display.value: ASAP - As soon as possible, next highest priority after stat

definition.value: ASAP - As soon as possible, next highest priority after stat

display.value: Callback results - filler should contact the placer as soon as results are available, even for preliminary results

definition.value: Callback results - filler should contact the placer as soon as results are available, even for preliminary results

display.value: Callback for scheduling - Filler should contact the placer (or target) to schedule the service.

definition.value: Callback for scheduling - Filler should contact the placer (or target) to schedule the service.

display.value: Callback placer for scheduling - filler should contact the placer to schedule the service

definition.value: Callback placer for scheduling - filler should contact the placer to schedule the service

display.value: Contact recipient for scheduling - Filler should contact the service recipient (target) to schedule the service

definition.value: Contact recipient for scheduling - Filler should contact the service recipient (target) to schedule the service

display.value: Elective - Beneficial to the patient but not essential for survival.

definition.value: Elective - Beneficial to the patient but not essential for survival.

display.value: Emergency - An unforeseen combination of circumstances or the resulting state that calls for immediate action

definition.value: Emergency - An unforeseen combination of circumstances or the resulting state that calls for immediate action

display.value: Preop - Used to indicate that a service is to be performed prior to a scheduled surgery. When ordering a service and using the pre-op priority, a check is done to see the amount of time that must be allowed for performance of the service. When the order

definition.value: Preop – Used to indicate that a service is to be performed prior to a scheduled surgery. When ordering a service and using the pre-op priority, a check is done to see the amount of time that must be allowed for performance of the service. When the order is placed, a message can be generated indicating the time needed for the service so that it is not ordered in conflict with a scheduled operation.

display.value: As needed - An "as needed" order should be accompanied by a description of what constitutes a need. This description is represented by an observation service predicate as a precondition.

definition.value: As needed - An "as needed" order should be accompanied by a description of what constitutes a need. This description is represented by an observation service predicate as a precondition.

display.value: Routine - Routine service, do at usual work hours

definition.value: Routine - Routine service, do at usual work hours

display.value: Rush reporting - A report should be prepared and sent as quickly as possible

definition.value: Rush reporting - A report should be prepared and sent as quickly as possible

display.value: Timing critical - It is critical to come as close as possible to the requested time (e.g. for a through antimicrobial level).

definition.value: Timing critical - It is critical to come as close as possible to the requested time (e.g. for a through antimicrobial level).

display.value: Use as directed - Drug is to be used as directed by the prescriber.

definition.value: Use as directed - Drug is to be used as directed by the prescriber.
